section.heading: Credit established.
section.text: *NOTE: This codification is not the most current, due to recent law changes. To see the current law (including emergency and temporary legislation, if relevant) click this link: Current Version*

para.text: There is established a District of Columbia low-income housing tax credit.
The Department may award District of Columbia low-income housing tax credits to eligible projects in accordance with § 47-4803.
The total credits available for the Department to award are as follows:
In each subsequent fiscal year, 105% of the total credits available for award in the prior fiscal year.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7017 of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).
The 2015 amendment by D.C. Law 21-36 substituted “tax year 2016” for “tax year 2015” in (a)(2).
